segments.text: I see the boy on the stool, and I can't help but smile.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's so determined to get those cookies, stretching as high as he can.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His little sister is right there, waiting for him to share with her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I love how kids can be so focused on what they want, even when there's danger around them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks like it's about to tip over, but he doesn't care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's got his eye on the prize, and nothing else matters.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope he gets those cookies and shares them with his sister.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Kids like him make me laugh, so full of life and energy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I remember being that age, willing to do anything for a treat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is a happy reminder of how simple and joyful life can be.
segments.speaker: PAR
